channel.title: Error connecting to server. Must be down
channel.description: Hey, I'm new to Moparscape and i have a problem. At first, it was working fine, but then i lost connection. I tried logging back on but it said "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click 'Cancel' then 'Start Server' to make your own." So I clicked 'Cancel' and then 'Start Server'. I did that, when I tried logging back in it said the same thing. If i exit Moparscape and start it again I can log on but it loses connection when i click anything. I'd appreciate any help. :)

item.title: Error connecting to server. Must be down
item.dc:creator: @Geoffrey1 Geoffrey1
item.description:
@Geoffrey1 wrote:

hello joe, all you gotta do is. close all the windows down ur in, close the moparscape client(were u play moparscape. and then it will bring your true internet speed back up, and then open moparscape client up then ‘start server’ then click “ok”. then click “Enter”, type ur username and password in and wallah! click login. it should connect only the server is online. im happy to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server. Must be down
item.dc:creator: @joe_mamma123 joe mamma123
item.description:
@joe_mamma123 wrote:

Hey, I’m new to Moparscape and i have a problem. At first, it was working fine, but then i lost connection. I tried logging back on but it said “Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click ‘Cancel’ then ‘Start Server’ to make your own.” So I clicked ‘Cancel’ and then ‘Start Server’. I did that, when I tried logging back in it said the same thing. If i exit Moparscape and start it again I can log on but it loses connection when i click anything. I’d appreciate any help.

Read full topic
